item.title: My Favorite Movies of 2019
item.description: Out of 74 movies, I wanted to pick a few that really stood out, and then talk briefly about a few that I really didn’t enjoy. I went to the theater quite a bit this year, as I live pretty close to one with couch-seats and luckily have a few film-buddies to meet up with. Other films that I didn’t get a chance to see while they were on the big screen were rented at home or watched through a myriad of streaming services I’ve accrued over the years.
